data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Saint Peter do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saint Peter, Antigua and Barbuda
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, comfort those who mourn in Saint Peter, Antigua and Barbuda.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

data.prayer: Lord, make the 1,439 believers in Saint Peter to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 4,361 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Saint Peter, Antigua and Barbuda.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Saint Peter, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the disciples in Saint Peter, Antigua and Barbuda to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Saint Peter to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.
